resources.string:
1. Press "Draw Card" to draw two cards one for the player and one for the opponent.
 
 2. Then press "Flip Card" to flip the deck card.
 
 3. The cards are then calculated which one is closest to the flip card. 
 
 4. The winner then gets 1 point or if its a tie no points. 5. The game goes on until no cards are left in the deck.
